snippet: Daniel St. Hubert, who was also charged with attempted murder in an attack on two children, is also a suspect in an attack in Chelsea that left a 53-year-old man severely wounded, an official said.
abstract: Daniel St Hubert is arrested in connection with stabbings of 6-year-old Prince Joshua Avitto and 7-year-old Mikayla Capers in Brooklyn, which left Avitto dead and Capers critically wounded; Hubert has extensive criminal record and was released from prison less than two weeks before stabbings after serving sentence for attempted murder.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Joseph Goldstein, Nate Schweber, Ashley Southall and John Surico.

lead_paragraph: Daniel St. Hubert, who was also charged with attempted murder in an attack on two children, is also a suspect in an attack in Chelsea that left a 53-year-old man severely wounded, an official said.

headline.main: Suspect in Brooklyn Stabbings Is Charged With Murder
headline.print_headline: Suspect in Brooklyn Stabbings Is Charged With Murder
